data.name: descriptionLabel.Text
data.value: The Merida eSpresso 500 EQ is the perfect electric trekking bike for adventures around town and beyond. This versatile ride pairs Shimano’s reliable touring and commuter focused E6100 drive unit with a powerful Shimano E8036 downtube integrated battery. The Prolite 66 triple butted aluminum frame with smooth welding and internal cable routing, is hydroformed, allowing for the formation of more ergonomic tube shapes. The casting motor bracket creates an integrated appearance as well as an extremely strong connection between frame and motor, while a two-component cover protects the battery from outside impacts and grime. Fast rolling 700c wheels are complimented by a Suntour NEX front fork offering 63mm of travel, to swallow up any curbs or potholes, while the Shimano Hydraulic Disc Brakes offer precise brake control. This bike also comes equipped with lights, a kickstand, rear rack, full mudguards and a frame lock.
